channel.title: Help me please!@@@@@@@@ read this!
channel.description:
ok i want to add barrows mini game with a working chest which needs a key that will be dropped by the brothers and when opened you would get runes etc and a random chance of a barrows item
how can i do this?
i want to make a chest which needs a key to be opened and when opened gives random rewards with a random chance of a barrow item, just like rs.
help me!
im using project czar source btw!
